modName: Medieval Hammered Coin - Henry VI Groat
descriptionHtml:
A quick re-texture of the coin that is used in Skyrim. Nothing fancy, nothing special just a quick re-skin. It doesn't look the best but it will do. It does look pretty good in game though but I'm new to all this. I wanted more real type coins, especially Medieval coins so I did one myself and here we are. I have several other coins available as well such as a Dobunni Celtic Gold Stater, Edward III Gold Noble and Elizabeth I Milled Shilling. I plan on making a lot more, mainly for my benefit but if you would like to use the textures feel free but don't expect amazing quality.

[color=#00ffff][size=4][b][u]Unfortunately I can't figure out how to change the name from 'Gold' because the coin itself is made from Silver![/u][/b][/size][/color]

[b][u][i][color=#ffff00][size=5]Installation

[/size][/color][/i][/u][color=#ffff00]1. Extract the folder

2. Move the 'Clutter' folder into your directory (Skyrim/data/textures)

3. Enjoy![/color][/b]
author: BigMoab
